mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.shouhuoxm AS "shouhuoxm", a.shouhuodh AS "shouhuodh", a.shouhuodz AS "shouhuodz", a.cunfangsj AS "cunfangsj", b.id AS "wuliugs.id", b.mingcheng AS "wuliugs.mingcheng", c.id AS "huogui.id", c.mingcheng AS "huogui.mingcheng", a.quhuoewm AS "quhuoewm", a.quhuoxm AS "quhuoxm", a.quhuodh AS "quhuodh", a.quhuosj AS "quhuosj", a.status AS "status"
LEFT JOIN daishou_wuliugs b ON b.id=a.wuliugs LEFT JOIN daishou_huogui c ON c.id=a.huoguiid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daishou_jilu( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, shouhuoxm, shouhuodh, shouhuodz, cunfangsj, wuliugs, huoguiid, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{shouhuoxm}, #{shouhuodh}, #{shouhuodz}, #{cunfangsj}, #{wuliugs.id}, #{huogui.id}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE daishou_jilu SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, shouhuoxm = #{shouhuoxm}, shouhuodh = #{shouhuodh}, shouhuodz = #{shouhuodz}, cunfangsj = #{cunfangsj}, wuliugs = #{wuliugs.id}, huoguiid = #{huogui.id}, quhuoewm = #{quhuoewm}, quhuoxm = #{quhuoxm}, quhuodh = #{quhuodh}, quhuosj = #{quhuosj}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
